analysis.description:
Distribution.init (/unique_chucks/26/0xf843b16b42ddf11301d60d89908322bc81622bda.sol#249-262) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) == _cap)

Reentrancy in Distribution.claimBonus (/unique_chucks/26/0xf843b16b42ddf11301d60d89908322bc81622bda.sol#263-285):
	External calls:
	- token.burn(stageCap.sub(sold[_stage]).sub(sold[_stage].mul(computeBonus(_stage)).div(1000000000000000000))) (/unique_chucks/26/0xf843b16b42ddf11301d60d89908322bc81622bda.sol#268-271)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- burned (/unique_chucks/26/0xf843b16b42ddf11301d60d89908322bc81622bda.sol#274-275)
